comments.body: do we need to Unfreeze the dm here to make sure the calls are made instead of short circuited?    Should we AssertExpectations on the mocks at the end?

Good catch. I think it's a good idea. This is one of the original tests that I enabled through making the function uppercase. To be honest I noted it worked and moved on. Looks like it could use a bit of work. I'll take a look.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +174,178 @@	dm, err := newDiskSpaceManager(mockCadvisor, policy)
	assert.NoError(err)

	dm.Unfreeze()
